environment.ride_select Module¶

class environment.ride_select.RideSelect¶

Bases: object

Class to select a suitable vehicle for a person based on vehicle attributes.

__init__() → None¶

Initialize the RideSelect class.

make_vehic_atribs_dic(vehicle_array)¶

Create a dictionary of vehicle attributes.

Parameters:

vehicle_array (list) – List of vehicle objects.

Returns:

Dictionary of vehicle attributes.

Return type:

dict

select(vehicle_array, person)¶

Select a suitable vehicle for the given person.

Parameters:

  • vehicle_array (list) – List of vehicle objects.

  • person – Person object.

Returns:

Vehicle ID of the selected vehicle.

Return type:

str

Raises:

ValueError – If no suitable vehicle is found.
